cab.content: 53CONFIDENTIALC.(54) 26911th August, 1954REVIEW OF THE GENERAL AGREEMENT on tariffs AND TRADENote by the Chancellor of the exchequer have discussed with the Ministers, principally concerned themain issues covered in my memorandum on the Review of the GeneralAgreement on Tariffs and Trade (C.(54) 268). As it is desirable topress forward with the further work arising out of it, and as no early meeting of the Cabinet is in prospect, I should be grateful if Ministershaving comments on the memorandum would send them to the Secretaryof the Cabinet by Monday, 16th August. A meeting of the Cabinet canthen be considered if this proves necessary.R.A.B.Treasury Chambers, S.W.1.11th August, 1954.COPY NO.CABINET
